contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Kanmaki |JapaneseName= 上牧町 |settlement_type=Town |MapImage= Kanmaki in Nara Prefecture.png |Region= [[Kansai region|Kansai]] |Prefecture= [[Nara Prefecture]] |District= [[Kitakatsuragi District, Nara|Kitakatsuragi]] |Area_km2= 6.14 |PopDate= October 1, 2007 |Population= 24,475 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees = 34 |LatitudeMinutes = 34 |LatitudeSeconds = |LongtitudeDegrees = 135 |LongtitudeMinutes = 43 |LongtitudeSeconds = |Tree= [[Maki]] |Flower= [[Lilium]] |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= 639-0293 |CityHallAddress= 3350 Kanmaki, Kanmaki-chō, Nara-ken |CityHallPhone= 0745-76-1001 |CityHallLink= [http://www1.ocn.ne.jp/~kanmaki/ Town of Kanmaki] }} {{nihongo|'''Kanmaki'''|上牧町|Kanmaki-chō}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Kitakatsuragi District, Nara|Kitakatsuragi District]], [[Nara Prefecture|Nara]], [[Japan]]. As of October 1, 2007, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 24,475. The total area is 6.14 km². ==Geography== Located in northwestern [[Nara Prefecture]], the town is slightly hilly. Only a small portion of the town is used for [[agriculture]]. It is about 25 km apart from [[Nara, Nara|Nara city]] and 25 km from [[Osaka, Osaka|Osaka city]]. ===Surrounding municipalities=== * [[Nara Prefecture]] ** [[Kashiba, Nara|Kashiba]] ** [[Kawai, Nara|Kawai]] ** [[Kōryō, Nara|Kōryō]] ** [[Ōji, Nara|Ōji]] ==Education== * [[Primary Schools]] ** Kanmaki Elementary School ** Kanmaki Daini Elementary School ** Kanmaki Daisan Elementary School * [[Junior High Schools]] ** Kanmaki Junior High School ** Kanmaki Daini Junior High School * [[Special School]]s ** Nishiwa School ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www1.ocn.ne.jp/~kanmaki/ Kanmaki official website] {{ja icon}} {{Nara Prefecture}} [[Category:Towns in Nara Prefecture]] {{Nara-geo-stub}}
